title: [W]Claimant pay details
p1: [W]It may help the tribunal if you can provide these details. You will not be penalised for not providing them.

et3ResponsePayFrequency.label: [W]How often was the claimant paid?
et3ResponsePayFrequency.hintLabel: [W]Use the same time period (weekly, monthly or annual) that the claimant used on the ET1 form.

et3ResponsePayTakehome.label: [W]Enter the claimant’s normal take-home pay (optional)
et3ResponsePayTakehome.hintLabel:
[W]Take-home pay is the pay after tax and insurance deductions.

Include overtime, commission and bonuses.

et3ResponsePayBeforeTax.invalidCurrency: [W]Pay before tax must be entered as a number and a minimum of double figures. For example 10

et3ResponsePayTakehome.invalidCurrency: [W]Pay after tax must be entered as a number and a minimum of double figures. For example 10

hiddenErrorField.sessionRespondent: [W]Unable to find selected respondent in session
hiddenErrorField.userId: [W]Invalid session user. User does not have an ID
hiddenErrorField.api: [W]A system error occurred, Please try again later
